summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1792, for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue North from Helen Street to the north line of Interlaken an addition to the City of Seattle, and Turner Way, from Twenty-third Avenue North to Helen Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with crosswalks, catch basins and box drains to provide for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 18691, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
